name: Social Share by WP Dev Shed
author: WP Dev Shed

sections.description: The easy and simple way to share you blog posts via Facebook and Twitter. Just activate the plugin and go to Appearance > Customize to set your preferences for display. You can choose to display before and/or after content on pages and posts. You can also choose to display the share buttons anywhere in a page or post using the short code [wpdev_social_share]
sections.installation:
1. Download the plugin.
  2. Extract the folder.
  3. Upload the /social-share-by-wp-dev-shed/ folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory on your site.
  4. Activate the plugin through the Plugins menu in WordPress.
  5. Go to Appearance > Customize to change settings
  6. Or use the short code [wpdev_social_share] to manually display share buttons anywhere in a page or post
sections.changelog:
1.7

  • tested to latest version of WordPress

1.5

  • Updated Customizer settings to set to off or disabled by default.

1.4

  • Added a new settings in Customize so you can now choose where you want the button to display either Post or Page or disable at all.

1.3

  • Added shortcode [wpdev_social_share], so you can display the social sharing button anytime anywhere you want.

1.2

  • Added feature to control where the buttons appear. At the top of posts, the bottom or both.

1.1

  • Removed the Facebook OpenGraph meta data
  • Modified the buttons and converted the text as part of the graphic

1.0

  • First release

short_description: Adds Facebook and Twitter social share buttons to your blog posts.
description: The easy and simple way to share you blog posts via Facebook and Twitter. Just activate the plugin and go to Appearance > Customize to set your preferences for display. You can choose to display before and/or after content on pages and posts. You can also choose to display the share buttons anywhere in a page or post using the short code [wpdev_social_share]

screenshots.caption: screenshot-1.png displays the Facebook and Twitter share buttons on an article
